name: a rocky beach
desc: You are standing on a rocky beach. Waves crash against the shore. In the deeper water, there are the shattered remnants of a sunken boat â€” your boat.

name: a narrow path
desc: You are on a narrow path, barely visible through the sandy soil. On either side of the path, long grasses sway in the breeze.

name: a small clearing
desc: You are in a small clearing outside a shack. The ground is sandy and unkempt.

name: an old shack
desc:
You are inside an old shack. There's a mattress on a small creaky boxspring, and a counter with a washbasin and some kitchen utensils.

It's dusty and basic, but this shack is a safe shelter from the elements.

name: a rough road
desc: You are on a rough road through weeds and brush. You can see evidence of wheel ruts in the hard-packed dirt.

name: a crossroads
desc: You are at the intersection of several dirt roads. The main road runs east and west, and a smaller footpath heads north.

name: foot of a cliff
desc: You are on a dirt trail and that ends at the foot of a high, rocky cliff. At the foot of the cliff you can glimpse a dark crevice in the rocks.

name: a riverbank
desc:
You are at the edge of a riverbank. The water is flowing rapidly and looks a bit too wide to cross safely. 

It looks like there used to be a bridge to the east, but the planks have fallen into the water.

name: a swamp
desc: You are up to your knees in a mucky swamp. Mosquitoes buzz around your head.

name: a swamp
desc: You are knee-deep in a muddy swamp. Mosquitos buzz around your head.

name: a grassy field
desc: You stand on a grassy field on the eastern bank of a rushing river. It's calm and peaceful here.

name: a hill to a lighthouse
desc: You are standing on a steep hill at the base of a stone lighthouse. The door on the ground floor of the lighthouse is open, and its stone walls tower above you.

name: a lighthouse
desc:
You're inside the ground floor of a stone lighthouse. An old ladder leads to the upper levels, but it's rusty and broken and doesn't look like it could take your weight. 

The lower floor of the lighthouse is dark and dirty and strewn with junk.
